entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 04:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain mixed with snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
